title: Virtual Reality (VR) Integrated Instructional Design for Medical Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical procedures and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational environment utilizing smartphone-based VR solutions.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance cognitive problem-solving skills by performing at least three complex medical simulations using VR technology.
Learners can complete patient interaction scenarios in an immersive VR environment to assess emotional empathy skills.
Learners can achieve at least 80% proficiency in two medical skills (e.g., injection administration, wound care) using smartphone-based VR tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
